CustomField.description: Formula to capture Billing Address from selected Billing Account
CustomField.formula: IF(Bill_To_Address__c != null, Bill_To_Address__r.Address__Street__s +BR()+ Bill_To_Address__r.Address__City__s + BR()+ TEXT(Bill_To_Address__r.Address__StateCode__s) + BR()+ TEXT(Bill_To_Address__r.Address__CountryCode__s),'')
CustomField.label: Billing Address Info
